issue.title: [CI] Integration tests are failing in master
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10769](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10769). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Caused by this PR being merged: <https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/8715>

We could revert this PR to unblock people.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10769?focusedCommentId=17240482) by Neville Dipale (nevi_me):*
`[~andygrove]`  I'm opening a PR that reverts this commit. I can have a look at it in detail later

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10769?focusedCommentId=17240526) by Neville Dipale (nevi_me):*
